name: @ccolleatte/claude-code-starter-kit
description: Claude Code Configuration Framework v4.1 - Doctoral-level standards

scripts.security:monitor: bash scripts/security-monitor.sh monitor || echo 'Real-time monitoring requires bash/WSL on Windows'
scripts.validate: bash .github/workflows/validate-local.sh || echo 'Run in bash/WSL on Windows'
scripts.validate:security: gitleaks detect --source . || echo 'Install gitleaks for security scanning'
scripts.validate:structure: python -c "import os; required=['.claude/CLAUDE.md', '.claude/CLAUDE-WORKFLOWS.md', '.claude/CLAUDE-VALIDATION.md', '.claude/CLAUDE-ERRORS.md', '.claude/CLAUDE-SETTINGS.md']; missing=[f for f in required if not os.path.exists(f)]; exit(1) if missing else print('[OK] Structure valid')"
scripts.check:env: python -c "import os; keys=['ANTHROPIC_API_KEY', 'EXA_API_KEY']; missing=[k for k in keys if not os.getenv(k)]; print('Missing:',missing) if missing else print('Environment configured')"
scripts.benchmark: python -c "import time,os; start=time.time(); [open(f).read() for f in ['.claude/CLAUDE.md','.claude/CLAUDE-WORKFLOWS.md'] if os.path.exists(f)]; print(f'Config load: {time.time()-start:.3f}s')"
scripts.test:autonomy: python -c "import os,json; files=['.claude/mcp.json', '.env.template']; ok=all(os.path.exists(f) for f in files); mcp=json.load(open('.claude/mcp.json')) if ok else {}; print('AUTONOMY OK: 4 MCP servers configured' if len(mcp.get('mcpServers',{})) == 4 else 'AUTONOMY FAIL'); exit(0 if ok and len(mcp.get('mcpServers',{})) == 4 else 1)"
scripts.docs:serve: echo 'Serving docs - open docs/claude/ for guides'
scripts.ci:local: npm run validate && npm run test:all
